name: I made this game because I missed you
name_original: I made this game because I missed you
description:
As a kid drives home and sees that someone is trying to take his cat away. Through the forest, he chases after the figure and finds himself at a odd mansion. Will he survive trying to save his cat? Or will the figure get the better of him?

Sorry if my emotions are a bit much, but I wanted to get it off my chest. I hope its okay.  
Warning: This game has mentions of animal death.  If you are uncomfortable by this, then please don't play.

Final music created by me with BandLab.com
